name: ButtonType
description: Determines if the button has special form-related functionality.

values.name: Button
values.description: The button does not do anything special when inside a form
values._jsDoc:
/**
 * The button does not do anything special when inside a form
 * @public
 */

values.name: Submit
values.description: The button acts as a submit button (submits a form)
values._jsDoc:
/**
 * The button acts as a submit button (submits a form)
 * @public
 */

values.name: Reset
values.description: The button acts as a reset button (resets a form)
values._jsDoc:
/**
 * The button acts as a reset button (resets a form)
 * @public
 */
